Posts.Content: So sorry to hear about your troubles! My twin sister has just been told she has a 2cm lobula lesion in her left breast, she has had a biopsy and mamagram ultra sound. Now waiting foor the results on tuesday at 10am15th April. I am wanting to know what to ask the doctor because she is too scared at the moment to think beyond a good out come. There is no history in our familt we are 42yrs old. I think from what i have read it is better to be diognosed after menopause???? I wish you the best of luck with your surgery and will try keep brave for my sister.
Posts.Title: Core Needle Biopsy Results 1 2
